programme.title: The Great Christmas Light Fight *
programme.desc: In the Season 4 finale, displays include a replica of the Space Needle in Maple Valley, Wash., a light show in Alexandria, La., a two-acre exhibit in Manchester, Tenn., and a theme park in Boulder Valley, Nev., in the first half of this combined episode. Then, a display by a family whose passion for lights goes back three generations in North Ridgeville, Ohio, eclectic decorations in Raleigh, N.C., an animatronic display in Corpus Christi, Texas, and a tribute to veterans in Sinking Springs, Pa. (cc)(n).

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia. (cc)(n).

programme.title: Let's Make a Deal

programme.title: The Price Is Right
programme.desc: "Come on down!" Contestants guess retail values for prizes on TV's longest-running game show. Bob Barker racked up over a dozen hosting Emmys since CBS first aired the daytime staple in 1972. When Barker retired in 2007, Drew Carey stepped in to ably fill his shoes. (cc)(n).

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. programme.desc: Real-life officers are followed by a camera crew, cinéma-vérité style, in a gritty up-close look at police work and the consequences of crime. programme.title: NFL Primetime
programme.desc: Highlights and in-depth analysis of National Football League action. Launched in 1987, the show was a popular lead-in to ESPN's Sunday-night NFL coverage for two decades before moving to Mondays in 2006. programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (live) (cc).

programme.title: Boca Raton Bowl: Memphis vs. Western Kentucky
programme.desc: Memphis (8-4) vs. Western Kentucky (10-3) at FAU Stadium in Boca Raton, Fla. High-scoring Conference USA champ WKU (45.1 ppg) rides QB Mike White and WR Taywan Taylor, along with ex-Louisville LB Keith Brown. Riley Ferguson QBs the Tigers (39.5 ppg). The Hilltoppers' current seven-game win streak includes a 52-3 win on this field vs. Florida Atlantic. (live) (cc)(n).

programme.title: The Affair: 305
programme.desc: Alison is motivated to spend a memorable day with Noah on Block Island for an unusual reason. Noah is left wistful by their profound connection, until the problems from which he was escaping return with a shocking force.

programme.title: Requiem for a Slut
programme.desc: The Gallaghers grapple with the loss of one of their own. As Lip takes steps to improve his future, Debbie, Carl and Liam get roped into Frank's new scheme. Meanwhile, Kev and V get their revenge on Svetlana. Season finale(c).

programme.title: The Affair: 305
programme.desc: Alison is motivated to spend a memorable day with Noah on Block Island for an unusual reason. Noah is left wistful by their profound connection, until the problems from which he was escaping return with a shocking force.

programme.title: Requiem for a Slut
programme.desc: The Gallaghers grapple with the loss of one of their own. As Lip takes steps to improve his future, Debbie, Carl and Liam get roped into Frank's new scheme. Meanwhile, Kev and V get their revenge on Svetlana. Season finale(c).

programme.title: The Affair: 305
programme.desc: Alison is motivated to spend a memorable day with Noah on Block Island for an unusual reason. Noah is left wistful by their profound connection, until the problems from which he was escaping return with a shocking force.

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford (Breaking Bad) hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's All Star Comedy Jam franchise in Las Vegas, featuring comedy veteran Earthquake who teams up with Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb, and Donell Rawlings to deliver a hilarious night of comedy.

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims.

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind.

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in this thriller as a divorced boat builder who believes his 11-year-old son is lying about witnessing his new step-dad (Vince Vaughn) committing a murder, until a little investigation reveals that the new man in his family's life is not who he claims to be. Teri Polo costars.

programme.title: Arctic Tale
programme.desc: The producers of "March of the Penguins" and "An Inconvenient Truth" team up to present this dazzling documentary that chronicles the endangered life cycles of a walrus and a polar bear, whose frozen habitats are rapidly disappearing thanks to global warming.

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.

programme.title: A Mighty Heart
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie stars in this emotionally wrenching adaptation of the book by Mariane Pearl, whose journalist husband was kidnapped and slain by fundamentalist militants in Pakistan. Dan Futterman costars with Irfan Khan and Will Patton in this searing chronicle of violence and redemption directed by Michael Winterbottom.

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: Comedy-drama based on the acclaimed novel about an English professor (Michael Douglas) who can't stop writing his new manuscript while he grapples over the holidays with his pregnant mistress (Frances McDormand), a gifted but troubled student (Tobey Maguire), a beautiful houseguest (Katie Holmes), a stolen car and his high-pressure, gay editor (Robert Downey Jr.). Rip Torn and Richard Thomas costar in this acclaimed, Oscar-winning film from the director of "L.A. Confidential.

programme.title: Weiner
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a jaw-dropping, behind-the-scenes look at the attempted comeback of Anthony Weiner in 2013 as he mounts a campaign for New York City mayor in the wake of his sexting scandal. But it's not long before history repeats itself and new sexting allegations leave Weiner and his aides scrambling to contain the damage. Featuring unfettered access to the candidate and his campaign. Winner of the 2016 Sundance Grand Jury Prize for U.S. Documentary.

programme.title: Jimmy Vestvood: Amerikan Hero
programme.desc: Satire about a bumbling Iranian immigrant who wins the green card lottery and moves to Los Angeles to pursue his dream of becoming an American hero and unwittingly becomes embroiled in a conspiracy to start the next world war.

programme.title: ONE & DONE/BEN SIMMONS
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports chronicles the sprawling journey of number one NBA draft pick Ben Simmons. From a relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in America to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league, ONE & DONE chronicles a pivotal period in a young man's life, capturing Simmons and his inner circle as they realize a lifelong dream in the limelight of an exclusive fraternity of top NBA draft picks.

programme.title: Running For His Life: The Lawrence Phillips Story
programme.desc: Feature length documentary examining the troubled life and tragic death of college football standout and talented NFL running back Lawrence Phillips, whose scars of childhood abuse and abandonment haunted him throughout his career(n).

programme.title: 2016 Week 15
programme.desc: Exclusive NFL Films highlights of every game, every week of the football season. Plus, hard-hitting commentary and expert analysis from host James Brown, Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Michael Irvin and New York Jets Brandon Marshall(n).

programme.title: Requiem for a Slut
programme.desc: The Gallaghers grapple with the loss of one of their own. As Lip takes steps to improve his future, Debbie, Carl and Liam get roped into Frank's new scheme. Meanwhile, Kev and V get their revenge on Svetlana. Season finale(n).

programme.title: 2016 Week 15
programme.desc: Exclusive NFL Films highlights of every game, every week of the football season. Plus, hard-hitting commentary and expert analysis from host James Brown, Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Michael Irvin and New York Jets Brandon Marshall(n).

programme.title: Drunk Stoned Brilliant Dead: The Story of the National Lampoon
programme.desc: Documentary reliving National Lampoon's meteoric rise from the go-to humor magazine of the counterculture to a brand that launched Hollywood's biggest comedies, featuring unseen archival footage, beautiful and shocking art, interviews with the magazine's best-known artists and writers and commentary from Judd Apatow, John Goodman, Billy Bob Thornton, Christopher Buckley and Chevy Chase(n).

programme.title: The Descent 2
programme.desc: Horror about a woman who emerges alone from the Appalachian cave system where she encountered unspeakable terrors and is forced to return to the subterranean depths to help locate her missing friends. As the rescue party goes deeper into uncharted caverns, nightmarish visions of the past begin to haunt her and she must fight for survival and redemption(n).

programme.title: Jimmy Vestvood: Amerikan Hero
programme.desc: Satire about a bumbling Iranian immigrant who wins the green card lottery and moves to Los Angeles to pursue his dream of becoming an American hero and unwittingly becomes embroiled in a conspiracy to start the next world war(n).

programme.title: A Mighty Heart
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie stars in this emotionally wrenching adaptation of the book by Mariane Pearl, whose journalist husband was kidnapped and slain by fundamentalist militants in Pakistan. Dan Futterman costars with Irfan Khan and Will Patton in this searing chronicle of violence and redemption directed by Michael Winterbottom(n).

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: Oscar winner� Anne Hathaway stars as a woman whose musician brother is left in a coma following a car accident, leading her to seek out his idols and finding herself falling for an unlikely match in this romantic drama set against the backdrop of Brooklyn's vibrant indie music scene(n).

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars in this tale based on the true story of Alan Turing, a genius British mathematician, who works against the clock to crack Germany's infamously unbreakable codes during World War II and defies convention in his personal life. Also stars Keira Knightley(n).

programme.title: The Boston Strangler
programme.desc: Crime thriller about a wise cracking, small time criminal with an unrelenting sex drive who concocts a plan with his cellmate to confess to the crimes of the Boston Strangler and gain notoriety and reward money(n).

programme.title: A Murder in the Park
programme.desc: Documentary glimpse into a very broken criminal justice system as nearly 16 years after his confession exonerated a death row inmate and sparked the end of the death penalty in Illinois, Alstory Simon languishes in prison serving a 37-year sentence over a confession he claims was coerced(n).

programme.title: Bert Kreischer: The Machine
programme.desc: Stand-up comedy special featuring inimitable storyteller Bert Kreisher, who expounds on a series of incredible and hilarious tales - from an unforgettable run-in with a grizzly bear to his legendary travels in Russia(n).

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: In her Oscar(R)-winning role, Julia Roberts stars as a fearless woman with no money, no job and no prospects who convinces a lawyer to hire her at his firm where she stumbles on a cover-up involving contaminated water in a local community and takes on the case of righting injustice with idiosyncratic charm and determined heroism(n).

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible(n).

programme.title: The Ladies Man
programme.desc: Hilarious "Saturday Night Live" spin-off starring Tim Meadows as Leon Phelps, a swinging throwback to the '70s enjoying his life as a Don Juan of the airwaves, dispensing naughty sex advice via his radio show. When he's fired for his politically incorrect ways, Leon seeks out an anonymous former lover who's offered to be his sugar mama, while he tries to dodge a mob of angry husbands whose wives have enjoyed intimate relations with the "ladies man." Karyn Parsons, Will Ferrell, Billy Dee Williams, Julianne Moore and John Witherspoon costar(n).

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Electrocuted in a hairdryer mishap, womanizing ad exec Nick Marshall (Mel Gibson) is suddenly able to hear the thoughts of the opposite sex. At first, Nick thinks he's been given a terrific advantage in the bedroom and the boardroom, but soon his psychic gift turns the once-clueless Nick into a better father, employee and man, a transformation that does not go unnoticed by his beautiful boss Darcy (Helen Hunt). Alan Alda, Marisa Tomei, Lauren Holly, Ashley Johnson and Mark Feuerstein costar in this comedy blockbuster(n).(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
